Roof and Door Actuation Systems for Demo Trailer

Custom designed actuation systems for a promotional trailer. Actuators had to fit within limited space while providing significant range of motion and multiple degrees of freedom. Front door and roof interlocked for sealing and structural integrity when closed.

Mitech Systems, Ltd.

Mechanical Engineering/Machine Design
